memberdef.name: CHECKBITWISEOPERATOR
memberdef.initializer: for (unsigned int i = 0; i < 32; ++i) { TmpArray[i] = uint8_t(_A_##Array[i] _OP_ _B_##Array[i]); } \ BOOST_CHECK(arith_uint256V(std::vector<unsigned char>(TmpArray,TmpArray+32)) == (_A_##L _OP_ _B_##L));

briefdescription.para: Convert vector to arith_uint256, via uint256 blob.
